title: Can we get a cooldown timer for Manaflow Band?
body: It would be really nice to know exactly when the passive will come back up so I can manage my mana a little better.

replies.body: We have a feature coming soon that'll make it clearer when manaflow band is actually going to be active for your next spell cast. Potentially in 7.24, might be a bit later.
Will this work for other similar runes as well?
Would be nice to get that on things like the rune that heals you when attack enemy and has 20s cooldown and othwr runes like that.

Agreed. The previous similar mastery activated on killing a minion, which means that the timing of this mastery wasn't as important as hitting a champion. You usually can't choose when to last hit a minion, you do it when you must. But you can choose when to trade with a champion.
With only 7 runes, I don't think it would even be that chaotic if all of them had a timer.
Can you make it so it's like a glow across the enemy mana bar? So we can see when the enemy will have the free spell to hit others with?
